completed_steps.summary: Classified as monolith backend with 1 part (odoo-server), 1369 modules, 15382 Python files
Found 100+ module READMEs, main README, CONTRIBUTING guide
Technology stack documented, all dependencies analyzed
Core architecture analyzed, key modules documented, strategic approach for GMS decision-making

findings.project_classification: Monolith backend, Odoo ERP v19.0.0, Python 3.10+, PostgreSQL 13+
findings.existing_docs: Main README, addons README/CONTRIBUTING, 100+ module docs
findings.key_modules_for_gms: account, sale, point_of_sale, crm, portal, calendar, hr
findings.coverage_estimate: 40-60% of GMS features covered by existing Odoo modules
findings.architectural_recommendation: Hybrid approach - Odoo backend for billing/compliance, custom frontend for member experience

resume_instructions: Documentation complete - proceed to validation phase
